ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Archers and Quivers
ygData.msgSnippet: The way quivers SHOULD work is you fill it up with the SAME arror type.  Once full you put one stack in your ammo slot. It should dwindle every arrow until you
ygData.messageBody:
The way quivers SHOULD work is you fill it up with the
SAME arror type. Once full you put one stack in your
ammo slot.

It should dwindle every arrow until you totally run
out.

This is how mine works all the time

Hope this helps

Rob

Miali 52 Ranger of Tunare
--- Techpriest <techpriest@...> wrote:
> Hi! new to the list. I play on the Tunare server.
> I have a 13 Iksar Monk
> but have been playing my 5 Wood Elf Ranger lately.
>
> My ranger has a quiver that he keeps his arrows in.
> I saw a tip when I
> logged on that says keeping arrows in a quiver
> decreases attack time. I can
> not get him to draw from his quiver. The only
> arrows he uses are in the
> ammo slot. The quiver will not fit in the ammo
> slot. If I have no arrows
> in the ammo slot I get a message "Out Of Ammunition"
> when I try and use my
> bow, even with my quiver full. I have tried putting
> the quiver on my back
> and it won't fit there either. I have asked a bunch
> of people in game with
> no luck, searched the web and looked in my hint
> book.
>
> While on the subject of archers, my bow and arrows
> each have a range and
> damage rating. My bow is Range 75 Damage 8 (I
> think). My arrows are Range
> 25 Damage 1. What is my range and damage? 100 and
> 9 by adding the numbers,
> 25 and 1 taking the lower of each? Something else?
>
> Thanks in advance!
>
>
>
